1. City Council

City Council
============

Agendas and notices are available prior to the meetings, and minutes are available following approval. Annual reports are released each year.

![Mayor Hill Oct 2025](https://www.cityofcorsicana.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=6533)

Term: May 2025 - May 2027
